name: Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Arcade
overview:
Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA Arcade is a port of the Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA with updated visuals

As the game is a port of the PlayStation Portable games, the gameplay is relatively the same as the original. The signature PlayStation buttons are now the 4 large buttons on the machine's panel, and players push those buttons to play the games. Unlike the handheld versions of the game, players can hold a button or buttons for an unlimited time when the game indicates to hold a certain note and multiple buttons can be hit at the same time. The arcade version features songs from both Project DIVA and Project Mirai, along with a variety of original songs not included in either series. The Promotional Videos for the game have been updated and re-rendered for the game bearing a similar resemblance to the Dreamy Theatre versions. The four difficulties are Easy, Normal, Hard, and Extreme, as seen in Project DIVA 2nd.
